short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Made by Magaz. This extension shows the number of the letter or letters to guess in the skribbl.io game. Made for lazy people.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to see the number of letters in a game of skribbl.io so that they can make more accurate guesses faster. For people that are lazy to count them themselves.
